email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 20-25. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider moving to the mid-40s? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $48.75 per ton. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.75 is more reasonable. However, could we push the laycan to October 22-27? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Let me know if this is feasible. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve checked with the owner, and we can adjust the laycan to October 22-27. However, the demurrage rate is firm at $25,000 per day due to the vessel’s tight schedule. Let me know if you can proceed with these terms. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, understood on the demurrage. Let’s proceed with the laycan of October 22-27 and the freight rate of $48.75 per ton. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks for your help! Best, John

email_chain.subject: Recap: Crude Oil Shipment - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, here’s the recap: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 140,000 MT. Load Port: Houston. Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Laycan: October 22-27. Freight Rate: $48.75 per ton. Demurrage: $25,000 per day pro rata. Please confirm if everything looks good. Best, Sarah
